item.title: Kelly Ripa's short hairstyle gets fans talking in latest photo

body.p: Kelly Ripa is renowned for her shoulder-length blonde hair, which she often wears down in a sleek, straight style.
But over the years, the Live with Kelly and Ryan star has experimented with many different looks, including an elongated bob.

p.strong: MORE: Kelly Ripa's $11 hair hack revealed to hide grey hairs

body.p: The mother-of-three reminded fans of her chic hairstyle after sharing a throwback photo of herself with her Hope and Faith co-star Faith Ford this week on Instagram, and fans were quick to comment on her look.

VIDEO: Kelly Ripa's family share glimpse inside their jaw-dropping garden

body.p: One wrote: "Get that hairstyle back!" while another commented: "Love the short hair!" A third added: "Absolutely love that hair cut Kelly!"

p.strong: READ: Kelly Ripa and Mark Consuelos announce major news: 'So exciting'

body.p: During the pandemic, Kelly has been keeping fans updated with her hair maintenance, and just like everyone else, she's had a go at cutting and dyeing her locks.

p.strong: Kelly Ripa's fans loved her short bob in her latest Instagram photo

img.p: In April, the Hope and Faith star told viewers on Live with Kelly and Ryan: "I'm not going to lie, I cut my own hair.
"I used kitchen scissors. We obviously don't have haircutting scissors."

p.strong: MORE: Kelly Ripa reveals incredible bikini body during family holiday
The Live with Kelly and Ryan star has been dyeing her hair during lockdown

img.p: The star was joined during the segment by husband Mark Consuelos, who admitted he was "ready to jump in" to save the situation if he needed to as he watched his wife at work.
Kelly has also used spray to cover grey roots while she was unable to visit a salon.

p.strong: Kelly's husband Mark Consuelos loves her natural hair

img.p: She explained on the ABC daytime show: "Anyone that follows me on Instagram knows that this is sprayed, and you kind of see it forcing â€“ it wants to show you, it wants you to see the reality," she said, spreading the hair on her scalp.

p.strong: READ: Kelly Ripa shares glimpse inside stunning garden - complete with show-stopping pool

img.p: "Since I met you, you only dyed your grey," Mark told his wife.

p.strong: Kelly and Mark with their three children

img.p: "I got to tell you that I see you in the morning and I think it looks beautiful. I like it. I'm looking forward to when it's just completely grey," the Riverdale sweetly added.

Things are slowly going back to normal for Kelly and her family following the pandemic. The All My Children star returned to work in the studio earlier in the month, while Mark is currently back filming Riverdale in Vancouver.
